intro: I am a Junior Front-End Developer from Visbek, Germany.
about: Since my childhood I have been fascinated by the world of computers; playing games or assembling components.
develope skills: I have solid knowledge in Angular, Typescript, HTML, CSS and bring a high level of curiosity and willingness to learn.
goal: This enthusiasm for technology and software has always driven me, which is why I want to become a front-end developer.
experienced: I am experienced in building various websites and business applications, as well as developing a jump-and-run game with object-oriented programming.
attentionToDetails: I pay a lot of attention to details, and for me, it's important to stick to the template and get the best out of it.
communication: Through my current work, I not only developed resilience and communication skills, but also learned to work effectively under pressure. These experiences are valuable and transferable, especially in the world of front-end development.
experienceDetails: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
sampleWorkDetails: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
contactFormDescription: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
